Writing Wizard Help

Welcome to the Writing Wizard Help page. Here, you'll find information and instructions to assist you in using the Writing Wizard Word add-in.

Getting Started

To start using the Writing Wizard add-in, follow these steps:

  1. Open Microsoft Word.
  2. Click on the "Insert" tab in the ribbon.
  3. Locate and click on the "Writing Wizard" button in the add-ins section.
  4. The Writing Wizard sidebar will appear on the right-hand side of the Word window.

The Writing Wizard add-in provides the following features:

  • Feature 1: Description of feature 1.
  • Feature 2: Description of feature 2.
  • Feature 3: Description of feature 3.

Troubleshooting

If you encounter any issues or have questions about the Writing Wizard add-in, please follow these steps:

  1. Check our FAQ page for frequently asked questions.
  2. Visit our Support page for further assistance.
  3. Contact our customer support team by emailing support@writingwizard.com.

We hope you find the Writing Wizard add-in helpful for your writing needs. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you.
